No new cases have been discovered for the 6th consecutive day.------19 people remain in hospital.------The latest recoveries were:------* Two Americans and one British from the Viking Cruise Journey in Kampong Cham.------*A 49-year-old Canadian man who works at an international school in Koh Pich.------* A 38-year-old Cambodian man from Battambang province.------A total of 122 cases have been recorded since the outbreak began
